items.title: The Essential Guide to Business Budgeting
items.headline: Because effective budgeting is key to any leader’s ability to successfully operationalize strategy
objectives_summary: In this 2-part course we will cover both the operating budgeting process and the capital budgeting process. By the end of this course, you'll feel fully equipped to prepare an operating budget which helps you successfully execute your strategy as well as know how to navigate your company's capital budgeting process when you need to gain approval for  a capital expenditure.

items.headline: Launch your new startup, become a successful entrepreneur, and learn from Ross Blankenship.
objectives_summary: Be part of America's hottest, fastest-growing startups: In this comprehensive 4-week boot camp, entrepreneurs and founders (like you) will learn how to create the next big-company – the next billion-dollar empire – while early-stage investors will get inside access to learn how to invest in the next big IPOs and future billion-dollar companies.
